QuestData.Title: Closing a Dark Chapter
QuestData.Description: This terrible place was Alexstrasza's nightmare. During what mortals call the second war, she was chained in the depths below, her tormented offspring forced to serve the demon-corrupted Horde.$B$BAlexstrasza may be free, but the beast known as Erudax still corrupts her offspring below.$B$B<Baleflame's body tenses in anger.>$B$BDestroy him, $c. Crush him that we may end these horrors once and for all!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: He lurks within the deepest depths of Grim Batol, his foul work unceasing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Erudax, the Duke of Below.
QuestData.RewardText: So it is done.$B$BWould that I could bring this entire mountain down upon itself, I would.
